        @RegisterOption
public static final Option<java.lang.Void> HELP
        Option that indicate that the user want some help about this pattern. Usage: --help, -h

public static final Option<java.lang.Void> FORCE

        Argument, Argument.registerArguments(Class)

      • registerOptions

        public static void registerOptions(@Nonnull
                                   Option... options)
        Manually register options. The key of the option will be name but uppercase.
        Parameters:
        options - The Option to register.

      • getOption

        public static Option getOption(@Nonnull
                               java.lang.String name)
        Works exactly the same as Argument.getArgument(String).
        Returns:
        The requested argument, or null if not found.
        See Also:
        Argument, Argument.getArgument(String)

      • getOptionByName

        public static Option getOptionByName(@Nonnull
                                     java.lang.String name)
        Get an option by its long or short name.
        Parameters:
        name - The name, short or long.
        Returns:
        The corresponding option or null if not found.
